title: thecrownismine
author: thecrownismine
content: A new community that focuses on the mass promotion of not so well known, quality altcoins.Join us on Discord FilipBullRun

comments.author: Vod
comments.body: Quote from: thecrownismine on December 12, 2023, 09:40:22 PMA new community that focuses on the mass promotion of not so well known, quality altcoins.Join us on Discord FilipBullRun New community with thousands of users?

comments.author: aliveNFT
comments.body: Hehe, i learned a good lessons here from some legendary users, and giving out tip about that:Never go throw link which is hidden behind text from noname user. Better Rightlick + copy link then just paste it somewher to see what is that.QuoteA new community that focuses on the mass promotion of not so well known, quality altcoins.Join us on DiscordFilipBullRunIn this case: https://thoughtful-cow.static.domains/ what the hell is that?

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: aliveNFT on December 13, 2023, 03:09:36 AMHehe, i learned a good lessons here from some legendary users, and giving out tip about that:Never go throw link which is hidden behind text from noname user. Better Rightlick + copy link then just paste it somewher to see what is that.QuoteA new community that focuses on the mass promotion of not so well known, quality altcoins.Join us on DiscordFilipBullRunIn this case: https://thoughtful-cow.static.domains/ what the hell is that?All the links on the site are useless, it just goes back to the homepage, the site is not properly configured, so much information is missing, and if OP claims to have a huge community then why he is using a free domain and hosted on a free server which is https://static.app/, they don't even have a list of project they have advertise so we'll know what these not so well know quality altcoins they are promoting.For all we know this is another platform for pump-and-dump meme coins, there are so many shitcoin meme coins it's hard to differentiate who among these are quality and shitcoin.

comments.author: thecrownismine
comments.body: what the hell guys?i created this clone page to put my Discord invite code, so I earn more rep on discordIt's a new community we are just beggining. We made profit already

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: Quote from: thecrownismine on December 13, 2023, 04:19:58 PMwhat the hell guys?i created this clone page to put my Discord invite code, so I earn more rep on discordIt's a new community we are just beggining. We made profit alreadyDiscord community, seems interesting. I understand your points, you're desperate to increase your community, I get it. But these proceeds ought to be done in a more precise measures, not everyone would jump into investing in this project and besides its a new one with no roadmaps that declared it to become safer for investors. Perhapes we should not be in a hurry to grab this opportunity, rather we take out time to ensure we're investing on a promising project, besides you wouldn't blame anyone that counter your opinions and ads with negativity, you don't how the terrible awful events they've passed through.

comments.author: www.Gambler.Casino
comments.body: I am not a member of communities. I think you need to be able to find important information on cryptocurrencies yourself. Trusting anyone is risky

comments.author: fullhdpixel
comments.body: Quote from: thecrownismine on December 13, 2023, 04:19:58 PMwhat the hell guys?i created this clone page to put my Discord invite code, so I earn more rep on discordIt's a new community we are just beggining. We made profit alreadyWhat made you come here and advertise your community if you are making a profit and everything is good already? We are here, it's also a community and we love it here, we don't need to go somewhere else just to get signals or information or anything regarding cryptocurrencies or shitcoins which are nothing less than a gamble if you invest money in them. I'm not trying to target you or anything, but most of the time, such communities or groups are pump-and-dump communities.I've personally never been a fan of communities where the users of the community or the creators would try to show or act like they are making a lot of money or profit because of being a part of that community just so that it raises some interest in you regarding the community and you possibly join it.

comments.author: Hewlet
comments.body: Quote from: thecrownismine on December 12, 2023, 09:40:22 PMA new community that focuses on the mass promotion of not so well known, quality altcoins.Join us on Discord FilipBullRun so I should just join the community without knowing how you run your promotion? This board has already been designed to serve the purpose your intended discord community is hoping to meet and with tyevwealh of experience members of this board have, I don't think that it is necessary to source for a different platform to get the same information  I can get from this plate. But regardless, I wish you the best luck out their.

comments.author: Samlucky O
comments.body: Quote from: thecrownismine on December 12, 2023, 09:40:22 PMA new community that focuses on the mass promotion of not so well known, quality altcoins.Join us on Discord FilipBullRun Checking from your domain I don't really think this is a genue project. Not every link should be click for security reasons.

comments.author: btc78
comments.body: Quote from: www.Gambler.Casino on December 13, 2023, 10:36:51 PMI am not a member of communities. I think you need to be able to find important information on cryptocurrencies yourself. Trusting anyone is riskyagreed but i also think it depends on the personit’s okay to have a community where you can find multiple altcoins such as this forum we can talk about different altcoins and do research ourselves and make decisions based on what we’ve researched it’s jsut good to have a compilation of possible altcoins to invest in

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Smile!!!   if really you community is a legit one then you don't have to beg but those who are in the community will make the advertisement for you and when I check the discord, it is not even working and that automatically shows that the site or the so call community is for scamming. And anyone who is in that community should be careful. Lolz. Op you would have worked on your website very well before informing people to join. Or is it that the total number of people who trip into the site caused the break down of the website?Oh it is your discord channel that is not working and that means you don even have a website for the community. If anyone want to participate in any of the altcoins then visit www.altcoinstalks.com there you can see more of them.

comments.author: Kelward
comments.body: Quote from: Mate2237 on December 17, 2023, 10:38:34 PMSmile!!!   if really you community is a legit one then you don't have to beg but those who are in the community will make the advertisement for you and when I check the discord, it is not even working and that automatically shows that the site or the so call community is for scamming. And anyone who is in that community should be careful. Lolz. Op you would have worked on your website very well before informing people to join. Or is it that the total number of people who trip into the site caused the break down of the website?Oh it is your discord channel that is not working and that means you don even have a website for the community. If anyone want to participate in any of the altcoins then visit www.altcoinstalks.com there you can see more of them. Going through the comments on this thread, it's obvious that the trust rating of the OP advertised community is very low, guess he should have done his home work well and tested it before bringing it to a forum of intelligent minds. I'm skeptical about opening links from unverified sources, even if I wanted to open the discord, going by the comments of members I probably won't. This is an anonymous forum and I'm careful in doing anything with anyone outside the forum, especially with newbies, so I don't get scammed. I however wish OP the very best in promoting the community.

Going through the comments on this thread, it's obvious that the trust rating of the OP advertised community is very low, guess he should have done his home work well and tested it before bringing it to a forum of intelligent minds. This is an anonymous forum and I'm careful in doing anything with anyone outside the forum, especially with newbies, so I don't get scammed. I however wish OP the very best in promoting the community.From my observation the op sounds so desperate and eager, if I may ask why promoting your community here with no proper back up or proof, I don't really understand the intention of the op because in this forum no one is ready to be fooled and what the op is trying to do looks funny, opening the link is not the problem but from what others are saying there's no need but when I tried using the link I didn't see anything it looks confusing but there's no need stressing myself secondly I can't just join the community without having proper information about the community, wishing the op community good luck but he should not expect such from this forum
